I Know What It’s Like to Carry Out Executions Link: https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2019/12/federal-executions-trauma/602785/

The experience of participating in the state-sanctioned killing of another human being has shaped me forever—and is why I believe this country should not pursue federal capital punishment. (From 2019)

The minute we make any decision—I think COVID-19 is serious; no, I’m sure it is a hoax—we begin to justify the wisdom of our choice and find reasons to dismiss the alternative.
